item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Stella Blues

At any Monday, we are usually the largest group at the bar.  Please ask the bartender if you do not see us.  Or text or call (my # is in my RSVP)

(please note that this establishment does not serve food - it only serves as a place to collectively socialize, have a drink, and listen to music!)

Happy Hour Special: $3 House/Well Drinks until 8pm

http://stellabluesbar.com/

voted:

1st Place Best Bloody Mary 2010 & 2011
2nd Place Best Specialty Cocktails 2011
2nd Place Best Martini 2011
3rd Place Best Live Music 2010 & 2011
3rd Place Best Singles Scene 2010

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please clearly state this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - 01/28 Stella Blues
